text: == Events == * Roman conquest of Britain begins. Roman London (Londinium) was established. * Claudius adds Lycia into Asia Minor. He combines it with Pamphylia to make a Roman province. * The Romans now have complete control of the Mediterranean. * Mark the Evangelist becomes the first Pope of Alexandria. === Asia === * Warfare begins between the northern and southern Huns * Vietnam is made a province of China * Vardanes I of Parthia forces the city of Seleucia on the Tigris to surrender == Births == * Martial, Roman poet == Deaths == * Togodumnus, King of the Catuvellauni
